identity.name: Nudge
identity.metaphor: A fresh start; A helping hand
identity.target_audience: Neurodivergent individuals (ADHD, Autism) struggling with executive dysfunction
identity.mission: To turn the overwhelming mountain of mess into a series of tiny, celebrate-able molehills.

design_principles: Breathing Room: 3x more whitespace than standard apps.
One Thing at a Time: Never show the whole list unless asked. Focus on the *next* step.
Celebration of Small Wins: Micro-interactions for every completed task.
Physicality: Elements should feel tactile (cards, sorting bins) to ground the user.
Nature-Inspired: Colors and textures that soothe the nervous system.

headings.usage: Use for all major section headers and encouragement messages. The soft serif adds warmth and humanity.

body.usage: Use for all UI elements, instructions, and buttons. Highly legible geometric sans.

gradients.subtle_mesh: radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, rgba(127, 168, 152, 0.15) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 100% 100%, rgba(224, 159, 125, 0.1) 0px, transparent 50%)

spacing_and_layout.grid_strategy: Mobile-first single column for focus. Masonry/Bento on desktop for 'Analysis' view only.

buttons.primary: bg-[#7FA898] text-white hover:bg-[#5D8072] rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-medium transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-[#FDFCF8] border-2 border-[#E5E0D8] text-[#2D3A3A] hover:border-[#7FA898] rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-medium transition-all
buttons.floating: fixed bottom-8 right-8 w-16 h-16 bg-[#E09F7D] text-white rounded-full shadow-xl flex items-center justify-center transition-transform hover:scale-110

cards.task: bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] border border-[#E5E0D8]/50 hover:border-[#7FA898]/30 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-white border border-[#E5E0D8] rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-[#2D3A3A] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7FA898] focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-all

navigation.style: Minimal floating dock or simple top bar. Avoid complex sidebars.

visual_assets.image_style: Natural light, soft focus, organized but lived-in. No clinical sterility.

icons.usage: Use 'Duotone' weight for a softer, illustrated feel. 'Fill' for active states.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Dark Green (#2D3A3A) on Off-White (#FDFCF8) is 13:1.
accessibility.motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Avoid rapid flashing. Transitions should be slow and smooth (0.3s - 0.5s).
accessibility.screen_readers: All images must have alt text. Sorting buttons must have aria-labels.

motion_guidelines.micro_interactions: When a task is checked, play a subtle 'pop' animation and show a confetti burst (use canvas-confetti).
motion_guidelines.page_transitions: Slide up for new contexts (like opening the camera), fade in for steps.
motion_guidelines.loading: Breathing animation (scale 0.95 <-> 1.05) rather than a frantic spinner.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run `npm install @fontsource/fraunces @fontsource/manrope @phosphor-icons/react canvas-confetti framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`.
SETUP: Configure Tailwind to use the 'Sage Sanctuary' palette.
FONTS: Import Fraunces and Manrope in the root layout.
COMPONENT OVERRIDE: Modify Shadcn Card to be `rounded-3xl` and `shadow-soft` by default.
CRITICAL: The 'Analysis' page should not look like a spreadsheet. It should look like a supportive report card with 'You can do this' messaging.
SORTING FLOW: Use a Tinder-like card stack or large distinct tap zones for Keep/Donate/Sell. Do not use small dropdowns.
VOICE: Error messages should not say 'Error'. They should say 'Oops, let's try that again'.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and demo states.
